item.description: Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#1532; 09:05PM; 8325 S Stanford Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3wuJXzx; #Florence; 30 Firefighters took just 28 minutes to access, confine and extinguish an outside rubbish fire that extended to and involved several detached garages. No injury. No other structures. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 33; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC11 BC13 E221 E233 E264 E33 E57 E65 RA257 RA833 RA865 T21 T33 T64; CH9; 14; Brian Humphrey

title.a: Update Major Emergency Brush Fire #PorterRanch - 05/15/2022 INC#1088

item.description: Update #PorterRanch - Major Emergency Brush Fire; INC#1088; 05:30PM; 11200 Porter Ranch Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3FRlIQu; #Chatsworth; While the fire's (area of) *origin* has been localized to *at or near* a freeway adjacent homeless encampment, the specific *cause* of the wildfire has yet to be determined by Investigators. LAFD and allied agency resources are expected to remain at scene through the night.; FS 28; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; AO1 AO2 BC10 BC12 BC15 BC17 BP109 CE59 CE83 CM42 E100 E103 E105 E107 E109 E18 E23 E28 E287 E290 E296 E37 E39 E63 E7 E70 E72 E73 E8 E88 E93 E99 EA1 EM14 EM17 H2 H4 H5 HA2 HA4 HA5 PI3 RA107 RA96 RI600 T87 T90 T96 WT88 + LACoFD + ANF; CH8; 18; Brian Humphrey

title.a: Update Major Emergency Brush Fire #PorterFire 05/15/2022 INC#1088

item.description: Update #PorterFire Major Emergency Brush Fire; INC#1088; 05:25PM; 11200 Porter Ranch Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3FRlIQu; #Chatsworth; 140 LAFD Firefighters continue to work the perimeter of the fire, which is now 75% contained, and remains at an estimated seven (7) acres. Hand crews from the Los Angeles County Fire Department and Angeles National Forest are assigned to assist with further containment, felling of dangerous tree limbs and cold trailing of the fire's perimeter. One civilian pickup truck parked at the Porter Ranch Drive park-and-ride lot adjacent to the 118 Freeway, was destroyed by fire. No injury. No structure damage. No evacuation. LAFD Investigators have yet to formally determine the specific origin and cause of the blaze.; FS 28; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; AO1 AO2 BC10 BC12 BC15 BC17 BP109 CE59 CE83 CM42 E100 E103 E105 E107 E109 E18 E23 E28 E287 E290 E296 E37 E39 E63 E7 E70 E72 E73 E8 E88 E93 E99 EA1 EM14 EM17 H2 H4 H5 HA2 HA4 HA5 PI3 RA107 RA96 RI600 T87 T90 T96 WT88 + LACoFD + ANF; CH8; 18; Brian Humphrey

title.a: Update Major Emergency Brush Fire Forward Progress Stopped - #PorterFire 05/15/2022 INC#1088

item.description: Update Forward Progress Stopped - #PorterFire Major Emergency Brush Fire; INC#1088; 04:30PM; 11200 Porter Ranch Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3FRlIQu; #Chatsworth; Despite wind-driven flames, 140 LAFD Firefighters responding by land and air have stopped forward progress of the fire in one hour at an estimated seven (7) acres. The fire remains south of the Ronald Reagan (SR118) Freeway, with some small spotting at the perimeter. The firefight continues, with a containment factor yet to be determined. No injury. No structure damage. No evacuation. LAFD Public Information Officer (PIO) Captain Cody Weireter encourages media to meet with him now near the LAFD Command Post, located on the Porter Ranch Drive overpass of the 118 Freeway.; FS 28; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; AO1 AO2 BC10 BC12 BC15 BC17 BP109 CE83 CM42 E100 E103 E105 E107 E109 E18 E23 E28 E287 E290 E296 E37 E39 E63 E7 E70 E72 E73 E8 E88 E93 E99 EA1 EM14 EM17 H2 H4 H5 HA2 HA4 HA5 PI3 RA107 RA96 RI600 T87 T90 T96 WT88; CH5; 18; Brian Humphrey

title.a: Update Major Emergency Brush Fire #PorterFire 05/15/2022 INC#1088

item.description: Update #PorterFire Major Emergency Brush Fire; INC#1088; 03:28PM; 11200 Porter Ranch Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3FRlIQu; #Chatsworth; With 116 LAFD Firefighters responding by ground and air, this incident, known as the 'Porter Fire' has escalated to Major Emergency status. The fire remains south of the Ronald Reagan (SR118) Freeway, fanned by 10-15 mph wind from the south. Though there are some spot fires near and within Monteria Estates, no residential structures are imminently threatened or damaged, and there is no formal call for evacuation.; FS 28; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; AO1 AO2 BC10 BC12 BC15 BC17 CM42 E100 E103 E105 E107 E109 E18 E23 E28 E287 E290 E296 E39 E70 E72 E73 E8 E88 E93 E99 EM17 H2 H4 H5 HA2 HA4 HA5 PI3 RA107 RI600 T87 T90 T96 WT88; CH5; 18; Brian Humphrey

Major Emergency Brush Fire; INC#1088; 03:28PM; 11200 Porter Ranch Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3FRlIQu; @Chatsworth; PRELIM: As many as two acres of grass burning south of the 118 Freeway, approaching heavy vegetation, fanned by 10-15 mph wind from the south. ; FS 28; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; AO1 AO2 BC10 BC15 BC17 CM42 E100 E103 E105 E107 E109 E18 E23 E28 E287 E290 E296 E39 E70 E72 E73 E8 E88 E93 E99 EM17 H2 H4 H5 HA2 HA4 HA5 RA107 T87 T90 T96 WT88; CH5; 18; Brian Humphrey

#Knockdown - #SanFernandoFire - Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#0785; 01:16PM; 10219 N San Fernando Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3wr39hK; #Pacoima; It took 71 LAFD Firefighters just 63 minutes to access, confine and extinguish this Greater Alarm fire that began as a large outside rubbish fire, extending into an unoccupied one-story church that has been heavily damaged by fire. Firefighters safely evacuated an undetermined number of persons from, and prevent fire damage to, an adjacent two-story residential motel ( Villa Las Palmas? ). No Injury. No resident displacement is currently anticipated. Fire cause is under investigation.; FS 98; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; AR1 BC10 BC12 BC14 BC5 CE83 CM42 E227 E239 E275 E288 E289 E298 E7 E77 E88 E89 E98 EA1 EM14 EM15 HR3 RA75 RA98 T27 T39 T75 T88 T89 T98 UR27 UR88; CH9; 17 18; Brian Humphrey

title.a: Update Greater Alarm Structure Fire #SanFernandoFire 05/15/2022 INC#0785

item.description: Update #SanFernandoFire Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#0785; 12:30PM; 10219 N San Fernando Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3wr39hK; #Pacoima; With 71 LAFD Firefighters assigned in offensive firefighting operations, this active structure fire is categorized as a Greater Alarm incident, known as the #SanFernandoFire. Flames from the large outside rubbish fire extended into and now heavily involves the rear/attic area of the nearby one-story (unoccupied) church, and continue to threaten a now evacuated nearby two-story apartment building. No injuries have been reported as the firefight continues.; FS 98; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC10 BC12 BC14 BC5 CM42 E227 E239 E275 E288 E289 E298 E7 E77 E88 E89 E98 EM14 EM15 HR3 RA75 RA98 T27 T39 T75 T88 T89 T98 UR27 UR88; CH9; 17 18; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#0785; 12:20PM; 10219 N San Fernando Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3wr39hK; #Pacoima; Address Corrected to 10219. Flames from the large outside rubbish fire has extended into a nearby one story (unoccupied) church. and is threatening a nearby occupied two story apartment building, which Firefighters have now safely evacuated.; FS 98; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 BC14 CM42 E275 E289 E298 E7 E77 E89 E98 EM15 RA75 RA98 T75 T89 T98; CH9; 17; Brian Humphrey
